greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A066638(n)/n, where A066638(n) is the smallest power of a squarefree kernel of n that is a multiple of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
program: A066638(n) = { if(n==1, return(1)); my(f=factor(n),me=vecmax(f[, 2])); (prod(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1])^me); }; \\ After _Charles R Greathouse IV_'s code.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 09 2002
